code: import React from"react";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{addCart}from"../redux/action";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"./SearchResult.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const SearchResult=_ref=>{let{result,addProduct}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const handleAddToCart=()=>{dispatch(addCart(result));};const handleAddToProduct=()=>{if(typeof addProduct==='function'){addProduct(result);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container my-3 py-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-result",onClick:handleAddToCart,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:result.id,className:"col-md-4 col-sm-6 col-xs-8 col-12 mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card text-center h-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"card-img-top p-3",src:result.image,alt:"Card",height:300}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"card-title",children:[result.title.substring(0,12),"..."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:[result.description.substring(0,90),"..."]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group list-group-flush",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-group-item lead",children:["$ ",result.price]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/"+result.id,className:"btn btn-dark m-1",children:"Buy Now"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-dark m-1",onClick:handleAddToProduct,children:"Add to Cart"})]})]})})})});};
